postAudioReleased

public void postAudioReleased()
Utility function to generate AUDIO_RELEASED event and post it to the event queue. Eventually fireAudioReleased will be called by dispatchSpeechEvent as a result of this action.

dispatchSpeechEvent

public void dispatchSpeechEvent(SpeechEvent event)
Dispatch a SpeechEvent. This is a method from SpeechEventDispatcher. The dispatcher should notify all listeners of the speech event from this method.
